Name: The Golden Moment
Ingredients: 25 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Special ingredient #1 : Cola syrup
History: Austrian Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail by Kenny Klein at Maniac Bar Artists of International Cocktail Catering in Bad Ischl.
Nutrition: One serving of The Golden Moment contains 145 calories
Garnish: Dark chocolate, dried fruits and dehydrated grapefruit dust
